elementSpec.desc: contains the name of a geo-political unit, such as a nation, country, colony, or commonwealth, larger than or administratively superior to a region and smaller than a bloc.

attDef.desc: supplies a regularized form of the country name using a name or code from ISO 3166
attDef.valDesc: The value used may be either a country name or a short code. Both are defined in ISO 3166-1.

remarks.p: To represent country names not included in ISO 3166, the standard suggests the use of a number of user assigned code elements, such as the letters AA, QM to QZ, XA to XZ, and ZZ, or the numbers 900 to 999.
